title: Break Blade 1: Kakusei no Toki (Broken Blade)
synopsis: Rygart Arrow is different compared to the other people in the continent of Cruzon: he is unable to control quartz, branded an "un-sorcerer." Despite this, he still befriends the future king and queen of Krisna—Hodr and Sigyn—as well as Zess, the younger brother of the Athens Commonwealth's Secretary of War.
related_anime: ['Break Blade Picture Drama', 'Break Blade', 'Break Blade 2: Ketsubetsu no Michi']
